Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9897680685/job/27342747369)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9897680685/job/27342747926)

Nifty! I'm not super thrilled by the implementation matching on the output of a previous delab, but I also don't have a case in mind where it fails.

I'll let Kyle give it a final check.

Nifty! I'm not super thrilled by the implementation matching on the output of a previous delab, but I also don't have a case in mind where it fails.

I'll let Kyle give it a final check.
Matching on `delab` like this feels a big fragile, but I don't think it's actually wrong.

I don't know if this design pattern is wrong because I don't have much experience writing delaborator.
I think it is better to ask @kmill.

Matching on `delab` is at least done in the builtin delaborators.

Here's a refinement of the code, along with having it check that `pp.explicit` is false as well, since `DFunLike.coe` and `Matrix.of` have some implicit arguments.

```lean
@[delab app.DFunLike.coe]
def delabMatrixNotation : Delab := whenNotPPOption getPPExplicit <| whenPPOption getPPNotation <|
  withOverApp 6 do
    let mkApp3 (.const ``Matrix.of _) (.app (.const ``Fin _) em) (.app (.const ``Fin _) en) _ :=
      (← getExpr).appFn!.appArg! | failure
    let some m ← withNatValue em (pure ∘ some) | failure
    let some n ← withNatValue en (pure ∘ some) | failure
    withAppArg do
      if m = 0 then
        guard <| (← getExpr).isAppOfArity ``vecEmpty 1
        let commas := mkArray n (mkAtom ",")
        `(!![$[,%$commas]*])
      else
        if n = 0 then
          let `(![$[![]%$evecs],*]) ← delab | failure
          `(!![$[;%$evecs]*])
        else
          let `(![$[![$[$melems],*]],*]) ← delab | failure
          `(!![$[$[$melems],*];*])
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Mathlib/Data/Matrix/Notation): delaborator for `!![a, b; c, d]` notation
